DESCRIPTION: Counts monsters currently summoned. Maximum of #b5 Summons.
#yOrb: At the start of turn, add #b1 #yMonster #yEgg to your hand. NL #yEvoke: Set the cost of #b1 random monster in your hand to 0.

Certain cards (like Monster Reborn) allow you to Resummon monsters. When you Resummon a monster, it replays the card, ignoring #yTribute costs. Some monsters have extra effects that trigger when they are Resummoned.
Removes X #ySummons. Unless you have enough #ySummons to #yTribute, you cannot play a #yTribute card.
Increase your maximum #ySummons by the number given.
#yOrb: At the start of turn, have a chance to increase all of your buffs by #b1. You have a higher chance if all monsters summoned are #ySpellcasters. NL #yEvoke: Gain #b1 #yBuffer.
#yOrb: #ySummon #b1 #ySpellcaster #yToken at the end of turn. NL #yEvoke: #yIncrement #b2.
#yOrb: Sets the cost #b1 random card in your hand to 0 when #yEvoked. At the start of each turn, increase the number of cards that will be reduced.
#yOrb: At the start of turn, gain #b3 #yDragonscales. NL #yEvoke: Sets the cost of #b1 random #yDragon in your hand to 1 for the turn.
When a card with #yOverflow is in your hand at the end of the turn, activate an effect. This effect has a limited amount of uses.
Can only be played if #yToon #yWorld is active. If you Tribute a Toon monster using another Toon, apply #b1 #yVulnerable to ALL enemies.
Tokens associated with the #yMagnet #yWarrior monsters. #yMagnets have no inherent effect.
Add #b2 #yRandomized cards to your hand. Gain #b1 random #ybuff. Apply #b2 random #ydebuffs to an enemy.
#yDragons have a chance to apply #yBurning to their targets. When you #yTribute a #yDragon for another #yDragon, gain #b2 #yDragonscales.
When you attack, if all the monsters you currently have summoned are #ySpellcasters, gain #b4 Block. You need to have at least #b1 #ySpellcaster summoned to trigger this effect.
When you #yTribute an #yInsect monster for another #yInsect, apply #b1 #yPoison to ALL enemies.
When you #yTribute a #yPlant monster for another #yPlant, apply #b2 #yConstricted to ALL enemies.

When you #yTribute a #yPredaplant monster for a #yPlant, apply #b2 #yConstricted to ALL enemies. NL When you #yTribute a #yPredaplant for another #yPredaplant, apply #b2 #yConstricted to ALL enemies and gain #b1 #yThorns. NL #yPredaplant monsters are treated as #yPlants.
#yOrb: At the start of turn, add #b1 #yRandomized #ySpell to your hand. NL #yEvoke: Set the cost of #b1 random #ySpell in your hand to 0.
#yOrb: At the start of turn, have a chance to #yChannel a random offensive #yOrb. You have a higher chance if all monsters summoned are #yDragons. NL #yEvoke: Increase your #yOrb slots by #b1.
#yOrb: Whenever you play a card, deal #b2 damage to a random enemy. Cannot damage #yBurning enemies. NL #yEvoke: Reduce the #yTribute cost of #yDragons (everywhere) by #b1 for the rest of combat.
#yOrb: At the start of turn, trigger #b1 random effect. If all monsters summoned are #yMachines, trigger the effect twice. NL #yEvoke: Trigger #b2 random effects.
#yOrb: Whenever you #yResummon, deal #b3 damage to ALL enemies. NL #yEvoke: #yResummon #b2 random monsters from your discard pile on random enemies.

#yOrb: Whenever you trigger an #yOverflow effect or play a monster with 3 or more #ySummons, deal #b9 damage and apply #yWeak to ALL enemies. NL #yEvoke: Increase the #ySummons of monsters (everywhere) by #b1 for this combat.
When you #yResummon a #yZombie, gain #b6 Block.
When you #yTribute a #yFiend for another #yFiend, place #b1 card from your discard pile into your hand.
When you #yTribute an #yAqua for another #yAqua, increase the #ySummons of all monsters in your hand by #b1 for this turn.
#yRandomized cards may have their costs changed, #yTribute costs reduced, #ySummons increased, may #yExhaust, and may become #yUpgraded or #yEthereal.
Cannot be #yResummoned.

#yOrb: Whenever you #yTribute, apply #b2 #yBurning to a random enemy. NL #yEvoke: Deal #b4 damage to ALL enemies. Evoke damage increases at the end of each turn while you have no water-based orbs channeled.
#yOrb: Whenever you #yExhaust a card, #yEvoke another random orb. NL #yEvoke: For each orb Evoked by this orb's passive effect, gain #b2 Energy at the start of the next turn.
#yOrb: At the start of turn, gain #b2 #yDexterity until the end of turn. NL #yEvoke: Play a random #ySkill you have played this combat on a random enemy.
#yOrb: Whenever you #yIncrement, deal #b2 damage to ALL enemies. NL #yEvoke: Deal #b4 damage to a random enemy for each card in your hand.
#yOrb: At the start of turn, activate the #yMillennium #yPuzzle. NL #yEvoke: Choose #b1 of 20 #yRandomized cards from the current card pool to add to your hand.
#yOrb: At the end of turn, gain #yBlock equal to half the number of #ySpells played this combat plus #b1. NL #yEvoke: Gain #yMetallicize #b3.
#yOrb: At the start of turn, apply #b2 #yPoison to ALL enemies. NL #yEvoke: Gain #b3 #yThorns.
#yOrb: At the start of turn, #yIncrement #b2. NL #yEvoke: Deal #b3 damage to a random enemy for each of your max summons.
#yOrb: At the start of turn, apply #b4 #ySlow to a random enemy. NL #yEvoke: Apply #b8 #ySlow to ALL enemies.
#yOrb: Whenver you draw a monster, increase its damage by #b4. NL #yEvoke: Sum the energy and tribute cost of all cards in your hand. Deal damage to ALL enemies equal to #b2x this sum.
#yOrb: Add a #yRandomized Power card to your hand at the start of turn. NL #yEvoke: Gain #b2 of the Storm buff.
#yInvert is the same as #yEvoke, except that you also #yChannel an Orb that is the 'opposite' of the one you #yEvoked.
Whenever you play a #yNaturia monster, gain #b1 #yVine. Whenever you #yTribute a #yNaturia for another, gain #b1 #yLeaf.
When you #yTribute a #ySuperheavy for another #ySuperheavy, gain #b1 #yDexterity.
Every other time you #yTribute a #yMachine for another #yMachine, gain #b1 #yArtifact.
#yOrb: At the start of turn, discard #b2 random cards from your draw pile. NL #yEvoke: Deal #b2 damage to ALL enemies for each card in your discard pile.
If an #yImmortal card is in the discard pile, gain [E] at the start of turn.
50% chance to trigger the action given after this keyword.
At the end of turn, gain #yBlock equal to the amount of #yMetallicize stacks you currently have.
When played, the power of one random effect of this card is increased by #b1.
Power cards that enable #ySpellcaster synergy #yTribute effects. You can only have one #ySpellbook active at a time.
Considered to be ALL monster types (Aqua, Dragon, Fiend, Insect, Machine, Naturia, Plant, Predaplant, Rock, Spellcaster, Superheavy, Toon, Warrior, Wyrm, and Zombie).
Playing unique pieces of #yExodia will add #b1 to your #yExodia power.
Can be #yUpgraded more than one time.
Debuff that chooses a random type of card. For the rest of combat, all cards of this type cost #b0. Whenever you play a card of this type, trigger a random negative effect.
#yOrb: At the start of turn, draw #b1 card. NL #yEvoke: Draw #b2 cards. NL Water is unaffected by #yFocus.
#yOrb: No passive effect. NL #yEvoke: Gain #yStrength equal to a random enemy's #yStrength. NL Glass is unaffected by #yFocus.
#yOrb: At the start of turn, gain #b2 #yStrength until end of turn. NL #yEvoke: Apply #yVulnerable to a random enemy #b1 time(s).
Giants are powerful monsters with high costs and unique cost reduction effects that trigger from any pile in combat. When played, these cost reductions are reset.
#yOrb: At the start of turn, siphon #b2 #yTemporary #yHP from a random enemy. NL #yEvoke: Play #b1 Dark Hole.
#yOrb: At the start of turn, add #b1 random #yToken to your hand. NL #yEvoke: Set the cost of #b2 random monsters in your hand to 0 for the turn.
#yOrb: Whenever you #ySummon, gain #b2 #yBlock. NL #yEvoke: Draw and discard #b4 cards.

When you gain #yBlock via the #ySpellcaster effect, you gain additional #yBlock based on how much #yMagicka you currently have. NL NL #yMagicka resets to #b0 when you trigger it, and at the end of the turn is set to the number of #ySpellcasters you currently have summoned.
#yOrb: Whenever draw a #ySpell or #yTrap, #yUpgrade it. NL #yEvoke: #yUpgrade all cards in your hand.
#yOrb: At the start of turn, gain #b2 #yFocus until the end of turn. NL #yEvoke: Apply #yWeak to a random enemy #b4 times.
#yOrb: At the start of turn: draw #b1 card, gain #b4 #Temporary #yHP, and add #b1 #yRandomized #ySpell to your hand. NL #yEvoke: Cycles to the next Anticrystal effect at the end of each turn.
#yOrb: At the start of turn, reduces a random one of your debuffs by #b1. NL #yEvoke: Permanently enhances all your other channeled orbs by #b1.
#yOrb: Whenever you play a card, draw #b1 card and discard a random card. NL #yEvoke: Discard your hand and draw a card for each card discarded.
#yOrb: Whenever you draw a #ySummon monster, #yUpgrade it. NL #yEvoke: Deal #b10 damage to ALL enemies.
#yOrb: Whenever you draw a #yTribute monster, #yUpgrade it. NL #yEvoke: Gain #b10 #yBlock.
#yErupt effects are triggered on all cards in your hand whenever you #yEvoke any #yLava orbs.
The first time you #yTribute a #yWarrior for another #yWarrior each combat, choose any #yStance to enter.
While in this #yStance, you take #b40% more damage.
In this #yStance, #ySuperheavy cards have a low chance to apply #yPlated #yArmor or #yMetallicize when played.
In this #yStance, whenever you play a card, have a #b25% chance to reduce the cost of a random card in your hand by #b1 for the turn.
In this #yStance, #yBlock from cards is improved by #b3. Upon exiting this #yStance, gain #b1 #yDexterity.
When you enter this stance, gain #b1 #yBlur. Upon exiting this stance, gain #yBlock equal to your #yDexterity.
Upon exiting this stance, gain #yVigor equal to twice your #yDexterity.
In this #yStance, whenever you #yExhaust a card, increase the magic number of a card in your hand by #b1 for the rest of combat. Whenever you #yBlock, randomize the amount of #yBlock you gain.
In this #yStance, whenever you #yExhaust a card, deal damage equal to your #yDexterity to ALL enemies.
In this #yStance, #yWarriors deal double damage and you cannot #yBlock.
At the end of each turn, gain #b2 #yBlock for each #yRock you have summoned.
The first time you #yTribute a #yWyrm for another each combat, double a random enemy's #yPoison.
The #b2nd #yBug you play each combat gives you #b5 #yTemporary #yHP.
#yCold-Blooded are #yStatus cards that #yRetain and reduce your max summons when #yRetained.
The #b3rd #ySpider you play each combat gives you #b7 #yTemporary #yHP.
At the end of turn, deal damage to ALL enemies. Damage total depends on the number of #yVines and the number of #yNaturias currently summoned.

At the start of turn, if you have at least #b5 #yLeaves, you may choose to consume your #yLeaves and gain #yBlock. #yBlock amount depends on the number of #yLeaves you have and the number of #yNaturias currently summoned.
Has a chance to apply #yWeak to enemies that do not receive attack damage.
Has a chance to apply #yVulnerable to enemies that do not receive attack damage.
#yDebuff that deals damage to the owner at the start of even turns. On odd turns, #yBurning is increased by #b1 and has a chance to spread to other enemies.
#yFrozen characters take #b200% more damage and deal #b70% less damage for one turn.
Enemies have a chance to become #yVulnerable whenever a #yMalicious card is drawn.
#yDinosaurs deal #b10% more damage for each stack of #yWeak on their targets.
#yBlock and damage of #yDragons is increased by #b1 for every #b4 #yDragonscales you have.
Whenever an Attack deals unblocked damage, apply #yPoison equal to your #yEnvenom.
#yOrb: At the start of turn, deal #b4 damage to ALL enemies, gain #b1 #yEnergy and #b5 #yBlock. NL #yEvoke: Effect cycles to the next Gate effect at the end of each turn (but with double the power).
